Section.Catchline: Disclosure and fees for production of records.

SectionBody.Text: If the department or office determines that any portion of a record that is requested by a person is exempt pursuant to chapter 119, the insurance code, or chapter 641, the department or office shall disclose to the person in writing that the requested record will be provided in a redacted format and that there will be additional fees charged for staff time associated with researching and redacting the exempt portion of the record. Before the department or office provides the record, the person must affirm his or her request to receive the record.
